info.title: Definitions used to create adapters and templates.

istio.mixer.adapter.model.v1beta1.CheckR.description: Expresses the result of a precondition check.

validDuration.description: The amount of time for which this result can be considered valid.

validUseCount.description: The number of uses for which this result can be considered valid.

istio.mixer.adapter.model.v1beta1.Templa.description: The available varieties of templates, controlling the semantics of what an adapter does with each instance.

istio.mixer.adapter.model.v1beta1.Info.description: Info describes an adapter or a backend that wants to provide telemetry and policy functionality to Mixer as an out of process adapter.

name.description: Name of the adapter. It must be an RFC 1035 compatible DNS label matching the `^[a-z]([-a-z0-9]*[a-z0-9])?$` regular expression. Name is used in Istio configuration, therefore it should be descriptive but short. example: denier Vendor adapters should use a vendor prefix. example: mycompany-denier

templates.description: Names of the templates the adapter supports.

config.description: Base64 encoded proto descriptor of the adapter configuration.

sessionBased.description: True if backend has implemented the [InfrastructureBackend](https://github.com/istio/api/blob/master/mixer/adapter/model/v1beta1/infrastructure_backend.proto) service; false otherwise.

@type.description: A URL/resource name that uniquely identifies the type of the serialized protocol buffer message. This string must contain at least one "/" character. The last segment of the URL's path must represent the fully qualified name of the type (as in `type.googleapis.com/google.protobuf.Duration`). The name should be in a canonical form (e.g., leading "." is not accepted). The remaining fields of this object correspond to fields of the proto messsage. If the embedded message is well-known and has a custom JSON representation, that representation is assigned to the 'value' field.

inferredTypes.description: Map of instance names to their template-specific inferred type.

@type.description: A URL/resource name that uniquely identifies the type of the serialized protocol buffer message. This string must contain at least one "/" character. The last segment of the URL's path must represent the fully qualified name of the type (as in `type.googleapis.com/google.protobuf.Duration`). The name should be in a canonical form (e.g., leading "." is not accepted). The remaining fields of this object correspond to fields of the proto messsage. If the embedded message is well-known and has a custom JSON representation, that representation is assigned to the 'value' field.

If the embedded message is well-known and has a custom JSON representation, that representation is assigned to the 'value' field.

inferredTypes.description: Map of instance names to their template-specific inferred type.

The last segment of the URL's path must represent the fully qualified name of the type (as in `type.googleapis.com/google.protobuf.Duration`). The name should be in a canonical form (e.g., leading "." is not accepted). The remaining fields of this object correspond to fields of the proto messsage. If the embedded message is well-known and has a custom JSON representation, that representation is assigned to the 'value' field.

sessionId.description: Id of the session to be closed.

bestEffort.description: When true, supports returning less quota than what was requested.

istio.mixer.adapter.model.v1beta1.QuotaR.description: Expresses the result of multiple quota allocations.

quotas.description: The resulting quota, one entry per requested quota.

istio.mixer.adapter.model.v1beta1.QuotaR.description: Expresses the result of a quota allocation.

validDuration.description: The amount of time for which this result can be considered valid.

grantedAmount.description: The amount of granted quota. When `QuotaParams.best_effort` is true, this will be >= 0. If `QuotaParams.best_effort` is false, this will be either 0 or >= `QuotaParams.amount`.

istio.mixer.adapter.model.v1beta1.Report.description: Expresses the result of a report call.

istio.mixer.adapter.model.v1beta1.Templa.description: Template provides the details of a Mixer template.

descriptor.description: Base64 encoded proto descriptor of the template.

google.rpc.Status.description: A status code of OK indicates quota was fetched successfully. Any other code indicates error in fetching quota.

message.description: A developer-facing error message, which should be in English. Any user-facing error message should be localized and sent in the [google.rpc.Status.details][google.rpc.Status.details] field, or localized by the client.

code.description: The status code, which should be an enum value of [google.rpc.Code][google.rpc.Code].

details.description: A list of messages that carry the error details. There is a common set of message types for APIs to use.

@type.description: A URL/resource name that uniquely identifies the type of the serialized protocol buffer message. This string must contain at least one "/" character. The last segment of the URL's path must represent the fully qualified name of the type (as in `type.googleapis.com/google.protobuf.Duration`). The name should be in a canonical form (e.g., leading "." is not accepted). The remaining fields of this object correspond to fields of the proto messsage. If the embedded message is well-known and has a custom JSON representation, that representation is assigned to the 'value' field.
